Text: hey.. so it ask me for a serial to activate it :3 .. can u help please.. or did i missed something when i install it? help please...
is it in the folder? cause.. i couldnt find it.. thanks again.. im dying to play this game..
Either you forgot to crack the game like it says in the .nfo(open with notepad) or you should just try entering a random serial

its me again..sorry.. so i follow the steps..but the problem is, when i paste it on the program files, it didnt overwrite any files in it.. and still asking me for the serial...i should just put random numbers? :3

Honestly I have no idea. Try searching for the files and be sure that the correct files are overwritten.

Yes you can try putting in random numbers. It sometimse works, but I'm not sure. I'm probably not going to check any more comments, so if it doesn't work, use your imagination :)
